snippet.title: W.A.N.D. Project | Release Date Trailer (Steam + Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
The wait is over! W.A.N.D. Project launches November 29th on Steam and Nintendo Switch! 🪄

The alien invasion has begun, and it’s up to you to rise as one of Tokyo’s defenders. Unleash powerful spells, team up with allies (some of them are magical), and fight to reclaim your city from the unknown. Are you ready to wield the Wand?

Prepare for battle. Save the world. 

Steam (Demo Available!): https://store.steampowered.com/app/2581750/WAND_Project/
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/w-a-n-d-project-switch/

#wandproject  #bullethell  #roguelike  #indiegames 

Follow us:
https://twitter.com/UntoldTalesHQ
https://www.facebook.com/untoldtalesgames
